## GET [/brapi/v1/trials/{trialDbId}]

```{r}
library(brapi)

# make sure brapiTS::mock_server() is running in a separate process

con <- ba_connect() 

args(ba_trials)

json <- ba_trials_details(con, rclass = "json")

```
